speaker: President. –
english: President. – The next item is Roberta Angelilli’s report, on behalf of the Committee on Civil Liberties, Justice and Home Affairs – Towards an EU strategy on the rights of the child ( 2007/2093(INI) ) ( A6-0520/2007 ).
